isis.stitle: TSI 06-04-01 - Revised Full Power Brake System Bleeding Pressure for International® 3300, BE 200, CE 200, CE 300 Bus Models with Traction Control Code 04JNG

subjectgroup.subject: Revised Full Power Brake System Bleeding Pressure for International® 3300, BE 200, CE 200, CE 300 Bus Models with Traction Control Code 04JNG

geninfo.para: Service manual S04048, Full Power Hydraulic ABS Brake System, is currently undergoing revision to improve the brake system bleeding procedure. The bleed pressure listed in the manual is 14.5 to 22 PSI has been revised to 31.5 to 38.5 PSI. Follow the bleeding procedure in the manual using the new pressure specification 31.5 to 38.5 PSI.
